t: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. - West Elm
s: Born in Brooklyn in 2002, West Elm is a design-led brand dedicated to helping people create spaces they love. Our team brings together modern style and thoughtful craftsmanship to make great design accessible, with a continued commitment to responsibly sourced materials and sustainable practices.
